args.natural_language_statement: Prove that every proper local diffeomorphism f : P → Q between manifolds without boundary, with Q connected, is a covering map.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Manifold TopologicalSpace
open scoped Manifold

/-- Prove that every proper local diffeomorphism f : P → Q between manifolds without boundary, with Q connected, is a covering map. -/
theorem isCoveringMap_of_isLocalDiffeomorph_ext {P : Type*} [TopologicalSpace P] [ChartedSpace H P]
    {Q : Type*} [TopologicalSpace Q] [ChartedSpace H' Q] [BoundarylessManifold H Q]
    [BoundarylessManifold H' P] (f : P → Q) (proper : ProperSpace P)

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Every proper local diffeomorphism between manifolds without boundary with connected target
    is a covering map. -/
theorem proper_local_diffeomorph_is_covering_map {P Q : Type*} [TopologicalSpace P] [TopologicalSpace Q]
  [Manifold P] [Manifold Q] [WithoutBoundary P] [WithoutBoundary Q]
  (f : P → Q) (hf : IsLocalDiffeomorph f) (h_proper : IsProperMap f) (hq : ConnectedSpace Q) :
  IsCoveringMap f := by sorry
